title: Partial repairs- The repairs to the extent of 75% of BUA will be termed as partial repairs
clause_text: Partial repairs- The repairs to the extent of 75% of BUA will be termed as partial repairs. The partial repairs shall be allowed with the permission of the Commissioner.
section: Repairs to be carried out can be categorized as detailed below:

source_pdf.text_snippet: Partial repairs- The repairs to the extent of 75% of BUA will be termed as partial repairs. The partial repairs shall be allowed with the permission of the Commissioner.
